about: This project is based on a used products resale market built with react.
features: This site is for buying and selling second hand mobile
A user can create a Buyer Account if he wants to buy a used phone or he can create a Seller Account if he wants to sell his phone
A user can simply login with his Google Account but it will be a Buyer Account by default
A Seller can add a product, see his added products
A Buyer can Book a product for buying, see his booked product
On this site here is an Admin, he can manage all the Buyers and Sellers

name: HR's Window (A Service Review Site)
about: This project is based on peoples' review on any service built with react.
features: This site provides some online contents on WebDevelopment. Basically it's a service review Website. A user can give review for the contents provided by the site owner.
A user can login with his email and password or he can login with google.
If a user is logged in he can add a review for a content, see his all reviews.
A user can also delete and edit his review if he is logged in.
There are some private pages on this site. Without login a user cannot visit these pages.

name: Test Prep (An Educational Website)
about: This project is based on online learning platform built with react.
features: It is an educational website which offers some courses on internationally recognized tests.
You can see the details about the course by tapping the 'Details' button.
You can get premium access if you are logged in.
There are three different login systems, Google, Github and Email-Password login.
You can create you new account with Google, Github or Email-Password.
